detail_desc: Brazilian briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Shorts in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated, drawstring waist.
Platform mules with a braided jute trim around the soles and a wide, twisted foot strap. Platform front approx. 2 cm, heel 4 cm.
Jumpsuit in woven fabric with long sleeves and a low-cut back with wide ties. Seam at the waist, side pockets, concealed zip at the back and straight, slightly wider legs.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Dress in patterned chiffon made from recycled polyester. Deep V-neck with a wide, flounced trim, an asymmetric seam at the waist and a concealed zip in one side. Richly detailed, knee-length, flounced skirt with a sewn-in wrapover and asymmetric hem. Recycled polyester lining.

Long dress in an airy, patterned weave with flounces. Round neckline with a V-shaped opening and ties at the top and flounces at the front. Long puff sleeves with smocking and a flounce at the cuffs and a frilled seam at the waist. Partly lined.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a round neck. Slightly longer at the back.
Double-breasted, fitted jacket in felted fabric with a high stand-up collar, decorative stitching front and back, side pockets and a decorative tab at the cuffs. Lined.
Dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with flutter sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist with decorative gathers.

Long-sleeved shirt in soft cotton twill with a collar, buttons down the front and small embroidered detail on the chest. Contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Lace bra with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Decorative straps at the front, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
Top in soft organic cotton jersey. Short sleeves with striped, ribbed trims.
Short skirt in stretch twill with a high waist with pleats and a detachable tie belt. Concealed zip in one side and side pockets. Unlined.

Set with a top and trousers in soft, printed cotton jersey. Top with short cap sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Trousers with elastication and a decorative bow at the waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Long-sleeved nursing top in soft jersey with a wrapover front and a practical inner top for easier nursing access.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a hook and loop fastener. Soft mesh inner shorts.

Jacket in a cotton weave with embroidered motifs and metal studs, a stand-up collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets and front pockets, and long sleeves with shaping seams at the elbows and buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Slim-fit, ankle-length jeans in washed, superstretch denim with a high waist, zip fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Trousers in a crêpe weave with elastication at the back of the waist and pleats at the front. Zip fly and button, a low crotch and wide, gently tapered legs.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a frill trim at the front, low waist, narrow ties at the sides and high cut at the back.
Vest top in soft jersey with a crocheted lace racer back and gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Shopper in paper straw with two imitation leather handles and a zip at the top. Two inner compartments, one with a zip. Lined. Depth 17 cm. Height 38 cm. Width 38 cm.

Bikini top in fast-drying functional fabric in a narrow cut at the top. Lined at the front with removable inserts, racer back in mesh with a chunky zip at the back. Asymmetric seam under the bust and wide elastication at the hem.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with wide ribbing around the neckline and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Jacket in a soft textured weave with a collar, concealed press-studs down the front and a concealed drawstring to define the waist. Chest and front pockets with decorative, rhinestone-clad buttons, and long sleeves with press-studs at the cuffs. Lined.
Ankle-length boiler suit in a crêpe weave with a resort collar, chest pockets and buttons down the front. Elasticated seam at the waist, half-length sleeves and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Tops in soft organic cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and long sleeves. Open chest pocket and a straight-cut hem.
Shirt in a softly draping viscose weave with a resort collar, buttons down the front and open chest pockets. 3/4-length sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs, and ties at the front of the hem.
Baby Exclusive. Hat in soft, rib-knit wool.
Felted wool beret. Unlined.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbed cuffs and elasticated ribbing at the hem. Soft brushed inside.

Cardigan in a soft knit containing some wool with a textured-knit shawl collar, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. No buttons. The cardigan is made partly from recycled polyester.
Short dress in a patterned crêpe weave with short, wide sleeves and a wrapover front with concealed press-studs and ties at one side. Unlined.

Knitted jacket with a soft thermal fleece lining, stand-up collar and small appliqué at the top. Zip down the front, side pockets and a contrasting colour jersey trim around the pockets, cuffs and hem.
Sandals in imitation suede with lacing at the front, an ankle-height shaft and covered heels. Imitation leather linings and insoles. Heel 8 cm.
Short skirt in a softly draping viscose weave. High, elasticated drawstring waist with a frill trim, and a flounce at the hem.
Short dungaree dress in stretch cotton denim with an open chest pocket, adjustable straps with metal fasteners, and buttons at the sides.
Short shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring jersey waistband, side pockets and rounded hems.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric. Lined front with removable inserts, a racer back and a wide elasticated hem. Extra firm support.
Strapless, non-wired bandeau bra in lace and mesh with padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Wide lace trim at the hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
LIMITED EDITION. Wide satin trousers with shimmering gold-coloured sequined embroidery. Regular, elasticated waist, side pockets and straight-cut, heavily draping legs.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.

Short dress in a crinkled, patterned weave with an opening at the front with twisted ties at the top. Decorative jacquard-weave trim around the neckline and down the front opening, a gathered seam at the waist and long sleeves with elasticated cuffs. Unlined.
Metal chain bracelets in various designs with a trigger clasp.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in organic cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder and at the crotch. One patterned and one in a solid colour.
Boys' briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined crotch.
Top in soft slub jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a deep neckline and 3/4-length sleeves. Raw, roll edges around the neckline and cuffs, and gathers in the sides for best fit.
Hipster briefs in jersey made from a cotton blend with a wide lace trim at the top. Mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.

Leather biker jacket with a diagonal zip down the front and notch lapels with concealed press-studs. Zipped chest pocket, zipped front pockets, a coin pocket with a flap and press-stud and an inner pocket. Zip at the cuffs. Lined.
Padded, quilted jacket in woven fabric with a stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Side pockets at the front and elasticated cuffs. Lined.

Shirt in cotton twill with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
T-shirt in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a round, ribbed neckline.
Shorts in woven fabric. High waist with elastication at the back, pleats at the front and a detachable tie belt. Zip fly with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners, and side pockets.
Boxy-style jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a round neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with a print motif and jersey-lined drawstring hood. Kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch, flexible denim for maximum comfort with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and straight hems.

Suit trousers in woven fabric with an extended waistband with a button, zip fly and adjustable tabs with buttons at the sides. Side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button, and slightly shorter legs with creases and turn-ups. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Short, straight-cut coat in a textured weave with concealed press-studs at the front and side pockets. Lined.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a button-down collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Fine-knit jacket in a soft viscose blend with a drawstring hood, zip and front pockets. Gently dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Straight-cut double-breasted jacket woven in a viscose blend with notch lapels and flap front pockets. Lined.
Fitted jumper in a soft, patterned knit with a turtle neck and long sleeves.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in stretch denim with hard-worn details. Regular waist, a zip fly and button and skinny legs.
Straight-cut, short-sleeved top in soft jersey with a wide neckline, motif on the front and cut-out sections at the shoulders. Longer and rounded at the back.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit containing glittery threads with an embroidered motif on the turned-up hem.
Classic T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and a round, ribbed neckline.
Scarves in patterned satin that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 30x80 cm.
Small shoulder bag with a concealed magnetic fastener and a flap with a decorative metal ring. Two-part inner compartment and a shoulder strap with a chain fastening. Lined. Size 5.5x14.5x21.5 cm.
Twisted metal hoop earrings. Diameter 4 cm.
Bell-shaped, pleated, calf-length skirt in woven fabric with an elasticated waist and laser-cut hem. Lined.
Sleeveless dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a seam at the waist, concealed zip in the side and flared skirt with an asymmetric, lace-trimmed hem. Lined.
Leather gloves with decorative tassels on the top. Soft, fine-knit lining.
Off-the-shoulder top in sweatshirt fabric with long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the top, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey with an adjustable, elasticated waist. One ribbed pair and one pair with an all-over print.
Long-sleeved tops in soft jersey. The cotton content of the tops is organic.
5-pocket, knee-length shorts in washed, stretch denim with a zip fly and button and tapered legs.
Short dress in patterned chiffon crêpe with a small stand-up collar and opening at the front with ties at the top. Short, flounced raglan sleeves, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Lined.
Slightly shorter hooded top in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with a print motif. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and a cut-off, raw-edge hem.
Ballet pumps in imitation leather with a grosgrain trim around the opening and a decorative bow at the front. Fabric linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Cold shoulder, knee-length dress in mesh with embroidery. Wide shoulder straps, a wide flounce at the top, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt in a double layer of mesh. Lined.
